Articles.Content:
how do I add my plugins the appropriate folders are missing. or all moved around...(plug-in data)

my parts folder is empty found other parts folders but which one do I put the mechjeb part in?

They are missing because you have yet to start the game

The second thing someone else will have to answer

yeah I've started the game and all...

looks like I will need to wait a little bit for the modders to fix a few things.

MEANWHILE the .20 update is very nice
